example: Search for 13 in the tree: start at 10 (go right), then 15 (go left), then 12 (go right), then 13 (found).
steps: 13 > 10 so move to the right child (15).
13 < 15 so move to the left child (12).
13 > 12 so move to the right child (13).
pitfalls: Stopping early when a child is null.
Violating the BST invariant during insertion.
